title: Mastering Photography with One Big Softbox
summary: In this episode of Learn Plus, photographer Lindsay Adler demonstrates the versatility of using a single large softbox to create a wide range of lighting styles, from clean personal branding to dramatic, sculpted portraits.

steps.action: Introduction to the concept of using one large softbox as a versatile lighting tool.
Create fresh, bright images suitable for personal branding.
Produce dramatic, sculpted results by adjusting the light angle.
Achieve high-key, ethereal, and glowing looks using backlighting and flags.
Modify the light by feathering, changing distance, and adding reflectors.

key_takeaways: A single light source can create drastically different results when controlled properly.
Key techniques include feathering the light, changing distance, and using reflectors.
Styles can range from commercial personal branding to dramatic artistic portraits.
